definitions.definition: the direction that goes towards the part of the earth above the equator, opposite to the south, or the part of an area or country that is in this direction:
examples: The points of the compass are north, south, east, and west.

definitions.definition: the rich industrial countries of the world, most of which are above the equator
the northern states of the middle and eastern part of the US:
examples: The North defeated the South in the American Civil War.

definitions.definition: in or forming the north part of something:
a wind coming from the north

examples: Go due (= directly) north for two miles.

definitions.definition: to or in the north of the country or region:
examples: I live in London, but my relatives live up north, in Manchester.
